original_title: Scientists Now Discover New Evidence to Reconstruct the Ecology of A.D. 2021
overview: The film is a speculated tv news, reports people in the future use Sedimentary ancient DNA (a method to detect the DNA of plants from the ancient soil and use it to reconstruct the ancient ecology)to discover our age, which aims to question artificial forests, and to re-examine nowadays ecological issues, ecological policies.
title: Scientists Now Discover New Evidence to Reconstruct the Ecology of A.D. 2021
